author: Simon Difford
description: Well-aged rum mellowed and sweetened by maple syrup. A spirit-forward sipper that's rich and easy.
name: Maple Rum Old-Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
